description: The round payoff this round was 90. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 67.5.

Choosing option 2 when the other player chooses option 1 yields a significantly higher individual payoff (67.5 vs. John’s 25% share) compared to mutual cooperation (45 each), incentivizing strategic defection
Mutual defection (both choosing option 2) halves the total payoff and splits it equally, leading to the worst individual outcomes (22.5 each), creating a prisoner’s dilemma-like tension.
